title: Endgame after still loading like 2 mins.
body: i got new customize building PC.  so i play this game til endgame then i clicked the victory after still loading like 2 mins and finally stats screen is up  there is a problem, i can't fins a clue to solve problems. i got SSD, should be no problem but still have a problem.  please help me, thank you.

replies.body:
If it's taking a while for the after match lobby to pull up, it's most likely due to your network having a difficult time reconnecting to the client after the game. Once the game is over, you drop your connection to the game server and need to reconnect to the client, which is where you're getting hung up. 

Take a look over the points in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and let me know if you have any questions!

Your own home internet might be running okay, but you can still sometimes have troubles getting connected to certain servers for a variety of reasons. The steps in that guide are designed to narrow down the main issue by going through some of the most typical causes. 

This could also be happening from a certain setting you might have enabled. If you're running the beta/updated client and have low-spec mode enabled, it can take a little bit for the client to pull back up. This is because low-spec mode actually closes the client while you're in a match, so it needs to relaunch after games before it can display the stat screen. Either way, essentially your client is having a hard time being able to grab the information it needs to display on the stat screen, which is why it's taking awhile to load. 

If the steps in that connection guide weren't able to help you may just need us to take a closer look at your system to see what's going on. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go much more in depth.
